name: Sock Man: Actually Happening This Time
name_original: Sock Man: Actually Happening This Time
description:
- Scout, a fast man that does a lot more shooting when with buddies. He dies quickly and easily. He takes 1 hit to neutralize.

  - Turret, a stationary idiot that shoots a lot of projectiles when he sees Sock Man. But only when he feels up to it. He takes 2 hits to neutralize.

  - Juggernaut, a faster Scout with a lot more bulk so he doesn't get beaned by Sock Man. He takes 4 hits to neutralize.

- Follower, a fickle man that runs after Sock Man and tries to kill him with projectiles. Due to his low health he stands no chance, but proves to be annoying in some cases. He takes 1 hit to neutralize.

  - Healthful Friend, a nice man who provides health and block at no cost. He rarely appears though, so be on your toes and play well.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WELCOME TO SOCKMAN, A GAME ABOUT A SOCK TRAINED IN S.T.I.N.K (SOCK TRAINED IN NOLGON KRINGUS) TRYING TO GET BACK AT THE CLEANING ENEMIES WHO KILLED YOUR SPECIES. I BELIEVE A KING WAS KILLED TOO BUT NO ONE CARES, HE WAS A RUDE MAN.

USE WASD, MOUSE, AND YOUR OWN MIND TO CONTROL SOCKMAN AS HE QUESTS TO BEAT MY GAME. THERE ARE MANY OTHER COOL THINGS YOU CAN DO LIKE FIND THE SECRET ENDING.

DON'T BE IDIOT, DRINK YOUR BLUE DRINK, AND HAVE FUN WITH SOCK MAN THE GAME THE SEQUEL ACTUALLY HAPPENING THIS TIME.
